attributes.action: Bring back old runescape PKing system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to propose that jagex bring back the old system of runescape Pking. 

The reason that they had given for the old system was unjust and unfair on all honest players of the runescape community. 

They say real world traders used the wilderness as means of transffering, but the only way they did this is by drag killing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
